items.sentence: Tom\'s muscles tightened when Mary touched his shoulder.
He\'s been staying at that hotel for the past five days.
Tom came on Monday and went back home the following day.
Tom corrected all the errors. Now the report is perfect.
Tom gave Mary the money she needed to pay off her debts.
Are you sure you don\'t want something a little smaller?
Are you sure you don\'t want to consider another option?
Tom ordered an open-faced sandwich with a side of fries.
Tom thought that Mary was likely to want to leave early.
Tom thought that he should go to Boston to be with Mary.
